title: TypeCulture and Mark Jamra: a very nice experience
content:
I recently purchased a few weights of Mark Jamra's Expo Serif:

[http://www.typeculture.com/foundry/font\_collection/font.php?ID=FNT09](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019145005/http:/www.typeculture.com/foundry/font_collection/font.php?ID=FNT09 "http://www.typeculture.com/foundry/font\_collection/font.php?ID=FNT09")

Not only am I exceedingly impressed with this font family, or rather, full type system, but I also received a lovely letterpress broadside in the mail.

All in all it was an excellent customer experience. Among other things, I had a question and it was answered promptly by Mr. Jamra himself. Their prices are quite reasonable, too.

Cheers,

Christian.
author: _Palatine_

comments.content: Though not as well known as some, perhaps, Mark has been in the type business for many years. He's a meticulous craftsman, a dedicated teacher, and an all-around good guy. I'm glad you got to experience some of this for yourself.
